Description: This automated stacks deploys a vMX its VPC, Subnets, route tables , security, some test bare metal networks and seervers. It configures the vMX ready to act as an SDN gateway. This brownfield version uses an existing VPC rather than creating it, so you can leave the gateway connected

AvailabilityZone1.Description: AWS Availability Zone For the SDN Gateway

SDNGatewayInstanceType.Description: SDN Gateway Instance Type. By default we run in lite mode

BareMetalServer1Deploy.Description: true and we deploy a bare metal test instance into bare network subnet 1 for you

BareMetalServer2Deploy.Description: true and we deploy a bare metal test instance into bare network subnet 2 for you

BareMetal1RouteTarget.Description: Route target for Bare Metal network 1, ge-0/0/1

BareMetal2RouteTarget.Description: Route target for Bare Metal network 1, ge-0/0/2

SDNGatewayFXP0PublicIPSN.Description: SDN Gateway public static IP SubNet Length

SDNGatewayAZ1PrivateIPGE000.Description: SDN Gateway private static IP on GE000 used for contrail controller traffic

SDNGatewayAZ1PrivateIPGE000SN.Description: SDN Gateway private static IP on GE000 SubNet Length

SDNGatewayAZ1PrivateIPGE000AWSGW.Description: AWS GW IP on the private subnets (control and data plane traffic)

SDNGatewayAZ1PrivateIPGE001.Description: SDN Gateway private static IP on GE001

SDNGatewayAZ1PrivateIPGE001SN.Description: SDN Gateway private static IP on GE001 SubNet Length

SDNGatewayAZ1PrivateIPGE002.Description: SDN Gateway private static IP on GE002

SDNGatewayAZ1PrivateIPGE002SN.Description: SDN Gateway private static IP on GE002 SubNet Length

UserLocation.Description: The IP address range that can be used for OAM access directly to the Gateway instance over internet. Typically your laptop /32. If left blank we will add 0.0.0./0 and allow ssh from anywhere
UserLocation.ConstraintDescription: Put your Client IP here x.x.x.x/32, if you leave it blank then 0.0.0.0/0 will be populated and the internet will be able access your deployments UI and SSH

BareMetal1Subnet.Description: VPC Subnet to create and attach to the vMX  port  ge-0/0/1. If  you do not want this subnet created then  set it to notset

BareMetalGateway1.Description: VPC Subnet AWS Gateway for port  ge-0/0/1

BareMetal2Subnet.Description: VPC Subnet to create and attach to the vMX  port  ge-0/0/2. If  you do not want this subnet created then  set it to notset

BareMetalGateway2.Description: VPC Subnet AWS Gateway for port  ge-0/0/2

SGSubnet1.Description: AN additional IP address range allowed in security to point towards the SDN Gateway on the private subnet

SGSubnet2.Description: AN additional IP address range allowed in security to point towards the SDN Gateway on the private subnet. Leave it blank if you do not want it populated

SGSubnet3.Description: AN additional IP address range allowed in security to point towards the SDN Gateway on the private subnet. Leave it blank if you do not want it populated

SGSubnet4.Description: AN additional IP address range allowed in security to point towards the SDN Gateway on the private subnet. Leave it blank if you do not want it populated

VPCCIDR1.ConstraintDescription: CIDR block parameter must be in the form x.x.x.x/16-28
VPCCIDR1.Description: CIDR block for entire management control VPC.

PublicSubnetCIDR1.ConstraintDescription: CIDR block parameter must be in the form x.x.x.x/16-28
PublicSubnetCIDR1.Description: CIDR block for the public subnet

PrivateSubnetCIDR1.ConstraintDescription: CIDR block parameter must be in the form x.x.x.x/16-28
PrivateSubnetCIDR1.Description: CIDR block for the private subnet AZ1

ContrailbgppeerIP1.Description: Contrail BGP1 Peer ip address x.x.x.x. If you are not running  HA  use the same address in  all three peers

ContrailbgppeerIP2.Description: Contrail BGP2 Peer ip address x.x.x.x. If you are not running  HA  use the same address in  all three peers

ContrailbgppeerIP3.Description: Contrail BGP3 Peer ip address x.x.x.x. If you are not running  HA  use the same address in  all three peers

ContrailbgpASN.Description: Contrail BGP Peer ip address x.x.x.x

ContrailUnderlayNetwork.Description: Contrails underlay Network CIDR for BGP and MPLSoGRE in the form x.x.x.x/xx

ContrailOverlayNetworks.Description: Contrails Overlay Networks to accept, Supernet in the form x.x.x.x/xx

idVPC.Description: Existing VPCid where the SDN Gateway will sit

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for the SDN Gateway, public and on internet

SecurityGroupIngress.Description: allow ssh access from the client

Properties.Description: allow inbound traffic to the SDN Gateway from a specified subnet subnet1
allow inbound traffic to the SDN Gateway from a specified subnet subnet2
allow inbound traffic to the SDN Gateway from a specified subnet subnet3
allow inbound traffic to the SDN Gateway from a specified subnet subnet4
allow inbound traffic to the SDN Gateway from the contrail underlay subnet

SDNGatewayAZ1PrivateIPGE000.Description: SDN Gateway WAN IP used by Contrail for control plane and data plane traffic

BareMetalTestInstance1.Description: IP Address for test bare metal instance 1

BareMetalTestInstance2.Description: IP Address for test bare metal instance 2

Fn::Join: ssh -i [your ContrailKey1 private key file] jnpr@

Hints.Description: The first time you use the vMX your stack will fail. In the cloudformation stack events you will be prompted with a copy paste link, to accept the terms and conditions for the AMI
